metadata.title: CVE-2021-37576 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
arch/powerpc/kvm/book3s_rtas.c in the Linux kernel through 5.13.5 on thepowerpc platform allows KVM guest OS users to cause host OS memorycorruption via rtas_args.nargs, aka CID-f62f3c20647e.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-37576` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-159-generic - 4.15.0-159.167
linux-image-4.15.0-159-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-159.167
linux-image-4.15.0-159-lowlatency - 4.15.0-159.167
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-159-generic - 4.15.0-159.167
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-159-lowlatency - 4.15.0-159.167
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-87-generic - 5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-87-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-87-lowlatency - 5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-87-generic - 5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-87-lowlatency - 5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1028-dell300x - 4.15.0-1028.33
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1010-ibm - 5.4.0-1010.11~18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-159.167').
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-87.98~18.04.1').
linux-dell300x package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1028.33').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm-5.4 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1010.11~18.04.2').
